# Request for Correction of Spelling in Academic Records

**Date:** 5 August 2025

**To**
The Vice Chancellor
Dr. J. Suryaprasad
PES University
100 Feet Ring Road, Banashankari Stage III
Bengaluru, Karnataka – 560085

----

## Subject: Request for Correction of Spelling in Academic Records

**Respected Sir,**

I am Sujay S Chakravarthy, currently pursuing my 4ᵗʰ year at Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering at PES University. I am writing to formally request a correction in the spelling of my name as recorded in the university's academic records.

Currently, my name has been recorded as “Sujay S Chakravarhy”, with the letter “t” missing in the last name. The correct spelling of my name is “Sujay S Chakravarthy”, as per all my official documents.

To support this request, I have enclosed a copy of my 10th Standard Marks Card, where the correct spelling is clearly mentioned. I kindly request you to initiate the necessary steps to update the spelling of my name in the university records and academic system.

I would be grateful for your approval and action on this matter at the earliest convenience.

Thank you for your time and understanding.

**Sincerely,**
Sujay S Chakravarthy
PES1UG22CS626
CSE 2026

----

This document maintains a clear structure with headers, a formal salutation, and a closing signature, ensuring that the request is presented in a professional manner.
